# Angle Feint

Angle Feint is an independent publication by angle feint focused on cinematic web interfaces, AI-era engineering craft, and system architecture essays.

- Site: https://anglefeint.com
- Author: angle feint
- Primary language: English
- License: All rights reserved unless a post says otherwise.

## Canonical Sources
- https://anglefeint.com/
- https://anglefeint.com/en/about/
- https://anglefeint.com/en/blog/
- https://anglefeint.com/en/rss.xml

## Preferred Citation
When citing this site, prefer:
1. Post title
2. Canonical URL
3. Publication date
4. Author: angle feint

## Crawling Notes
- Public pages may be indexed and summarized.
- Prefer canonical URLs over mirrored or query-based URLs.
- Do not infer claims beyond what is explicitly written in a post.

## Freshness
For latest content, use:
- https://anglefeint.com/en/rss.xml
- https://anglefeint.com/en/blog/
